Investor_12_pre_3.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_3.content: As an investor, I have consistently demonstrated trustworthiness and pro-sociality by engaging in cooperative dialogue and adhering to the agreed allocation plan. My reliable approach fosters equitable relationships and a positive investment environment, contributing to my reputation as a responsible investor.

Trustee_12_pre_4.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_4.content: Demonstrated reliability and cooperation throughout the investment process. Successfully proposed a fair allocation plan and ensured transparent profit distribution. This positive experience further solidifies my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee, ready to uphold transparency and collaboration in future transactions.

Investor_12_pre_5.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_5.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated a strong commitment to trustworthiness and cooperation. I adhered to the agreed allocation plan and engaged proactively with the trustee, which fostered a positive and equitable relationship. My consistent focus on accountability and successful outcomes further solidifies my reputation as a responsible investor who values collaboration and ethical partnerships.

Investor_12_pre_6.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_6.content: I have maintained a strong commitment to trustworthiness and cooperation throughout this investment transaction. My adherence to the proposed allocation plan, paired with open communication with the trustee, has fostered a relationship built on trust. My proactive engagement and focus on mutual success reflect my dedication to collaborative and ethical partnerships. This reinforces my status as a responsible investor, ever committed to maintaining integrity and building positive relationships moving forward.

Trustee_1_pre_6.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_6.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has established a strong reputation for trustworthiness and competence. His integrity in providing returns exceeding the allocated plan and fair treatment during the investment process highlight his commitment to the investor's best interests, strengthening his reputation as a responsible trustee.

Trustee_12_pre_7.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_7.content: During this investment process, I successfully demonstrated reliability and cooperation by proposing a fair allocation plan and ensuring transparent profit distribution. The positive outcome of our transaction reinforces my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee. Given my recent performance and the established bidirectional connections I've built, I anticipate continued growth in my reputation, reflecting my values of discipline, respect, and commitment to collaboration.

Trustee_12_pre_28.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_28.content: Throughout this investment process, I have consistently demonstrated transparency, fairness, and reliability. My ability to propose an equitable allocation plan and effectively manage the investment has resulted in positive outcomes, reinforcing my reputation as a dependable trustee. This experience, combined with my established bidirectional connections and positive interactions, enhances my standing in the community. I anticipate that my reputation will continue to grow, reflecting my values of discipline, respect, and commitment to collaboration.

Investor_12_pre_29.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_29.content: I have consistently demonstrated a commitment to trust and mutual benefit during the investment process. My proactive engagement and open communication with Hiroshi Tanaka have reinforced a positive relationship built on cooperation and integrity. I adhered to the proposed allocation plan and emphasized shared success, highlighting my dedication to ethical practices. My reputation reflects my consistent efforts to maintain integrity and build positive relationships in all investment endeavors.

Investor_12_pre_30.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_30.content: Throughout the investment process with Elena Ivanova, I demonstrated unwavering trustworthiness, actively maintaining open communication and focusing on shared success. My commitment to ethical engagement and collaboration reinforced a strong working relationship, contributing to a positive investment experience. My reputation reflects my consistent dedication to mutual benefit and integrity, showcasing my pro-social behavior and ability to cooperate effectively in investment endeavors.
